### 간단한 계산기 만들기

```Java
import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.InputStreamReader;

public class calcTest {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		while(true) {
			try {
				InputStreamReader ir = new InputStreamReader(System.in);
				BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(ir);
				System.out.println("1.ADD  2.SUB  3.MUL  4.DIV  5.CNT");
				System.out.print("Option Number : ");
				String str = br.readLine();
				int op = Integer.parseInt(str);
				
				if(op >= 1 && op <= 4) {
					System.out.print("First Number : ");
					String str1 = br.readLine();
					int n1 = Integer.parseInt(str1);
					
					System.out.print("Second Number : ");
					String str2 = br.readLine();
					int n2 = Integer.parseInt(str2);
					
					System.out.println("Answer : " + calc(op, n1, n2));
				}
				else if(op == 5) {
					System.out.print("Standard Number : ");
					String str1 = br.readLine();
					
					System.out.print("Check Number : ");
					String str2 = br.readLine();
					
					System.out.println("Answer : " + count(str1, 0, str2.charAt(0)));
				}
				else {
					System.out.println("Invalid Number");
					break;
				}
			} catch (Exception e) {}
			System.out.println();
		}
	}

	public static int calc(int op, int A, int B) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		if(op == 1) {
			return A + B;
		}
		else if(op == 2) {
			return A - B;
		}
		else if(op == 3) {
			return A * B;
		}
		else {
			return A / B;
		}
	}
	
	public static int count(String str, int idx, char ch) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		if(idx == str.length()) return 0;
		else {
			if(str.charAt(idx) == ch) {
				return 1 + count(str, idx + 1, ch);
			}
			else {
				return count(str, idx + 1, ch);
			}
		}
	}
}
